amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the Healthy Food Financing Initiative (HFFI) from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to strike the Health Food Financing Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 232 (Roll no. 267).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 232 (Roll no. 267).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Schweikert.
